packageMeta.name: purescript-bucketchain-simple-api
packageMeta.description: A simple RPC style API middleware of Bucketchain.

declarations.comments:
SimpleAPI middleware.

`ex` is any extra data. It is typically global context such as db connection and can be used in `Action`.

`server` is a `Servable` instance.
declarations.title: withSimpleAPI

declarations.comments: The type of global context.
declarations.title: Context

declarations.comments: The type of request handler.
declarations.title: Action

declarations.comments: Get global context.
declarations.title: askExtra

declarations.comments: Get `RawData`.
declarations.title: askRaw

declarations.comments: This is for internal. Do not use it.
declarations.title: runAction

declarations.comments:
The type for request handlers with authentication.

example:

```purescript
-- This request handler is run with authentication.
getItems :: Auth User -> Action AppContext (JSON Item)
```
declarations.title: Auth

declarations.comments:
A typeclass for authentication.

`ex` is any extra data. It is typically global context such as db connection and can be used in `Action`.

`a` is a authenticated result. It is typically user data.

If you call `throwError` in `authenticate` implementation, a server responds 401.
declarations.title: Authenticatable

declarations.comments: This is for internal. Do not use it.
declarations.title: BatchParams
Batch

declarations.comments:
The type for request handlers with request body.

You can use `ReadForeign` instances as type variable `a`.
declarations.title: Body

declarations.comments: This is for internal. Do not use it.
declarations.title: decodeBody

declarations.comments:
A typeclass what type is servable.

If you return `Nothing` in implementation, SimpleAPI proceeds to the next middleware.
declarations.title: Servable

declarations.comments: This is for internal. Do not use it.
declarations.title: ServableList

declarations.comments: The type for JSON response.
declarations.title: JSON

declarations.comments: Create a success response.
declarations.title: success

declarations.comments: Create a failure response.
declarations.title: failure

declarations.comments: Create a success response without headers.
declarations.title: success_

declarations.comments: Create a failure response without headers.
declarations.title: failure_

declarations.comments: A type synonym for raw data.
declarations.title: RawData

declarations.comments: The type for response used in `Servable` implementation.
declarations.title: Response

declarations.comments: This is for internal. Do not use it.
declarations.title: fromResponses

declarations.comments: This is for internal. Do not use it.
declarations.title: invalidRequestResponse

declarations.comments: This is for internal. Do not use it.
declarations.title: unauthorizedResponse

declarations.comments: This is for internal. Do not use it.
declarations.title: errorResponse

declarations.comments: A typeclass what type can be response.
declarations.title: Respondable
